name: The Customer is Always Right!
description:
It's your first day at the job, just like any other week!

Enter the immersive town known as Neverquit, as you follow your protagonist (and optional feline companion!) through a journey as a customer service cashier at the local Shop n' Stuff!



Features:
  • Dynamic gameplay of various elements involving action/quick-time events!
  • Old-school style RPG elements, to give you that nostalgic feeling!
  • With special gear, you can make the game into a resettable rogue-like that "remembers" your previous reset!
  • Unique RPG classes, such as "Schrodinger" -- a class that learns new abilities on game resets, and "Tactician," requiring stance changes for techniques!
  • Events and scenes in the game feel like it's old school goodness, complete with retro sound effects and music!
  • An incredible soundtrack, awesome pixel-style graphics and animations!
  • A story that blossoms every time you reset or get an ending in the game, with a dynamic day-to-day system!
  • ... And more!



Hurry up, clock on in, what do you have to lose?! Maybe you'll learn a thing or two about the trick of the trade. Buy The Customer Is Always Right! today!
